111.content: What's the gender of the horse?
111.title: Horse

choices: "It's too hot out, let's just stay and talk"
11121.content:
"Happy birth day!" You hear your parents shout when you get to the table for breakfast. "Thanks mom! Thanks dad!" Your mother places a plate of food In front of you. "So how does it feel being 13 now jake?" You stop your self from the scoop of scrambled eggs on your fork. "It feels great mom! I'm no longer a kid, and I'm a teen now." You say feeling proud of yourself. "Your right kiddo" your dad says "and that means you now hove bigger responsibilities. Like maybe a certain gift your getting today."

Yep today you sure are getting a big responsibility. Just last week, a little stable was built on your property for a horse. A horse you are getting for your birthday present! So after breakfast your parents blind fold you, and bring you out to the stables.

"Three... Two... One... Happy birthday!" Your parents say ripping off your blind fold. You expect to see a awesome horse in front of you, but instead. It's standing. On two legs! "What is this!" You yell. Your dad laughs. "Haha. Didn't expect us to do such a great job son. And I know what your thinking, but getting a pure breed was a little out of our price range, but I'm sure you won't mind a Shire mixed with a Clydesdale. Anyways. We will leave you two to get acquainted. See ya later." He says leaving with your mom.

Now it's just you and this big anthro horse standing in front of you. You eventually speak up. "S...so can you talk like people?" You ask. The mare just rolls her eyes "of course I can, but it seems like no one cares. I mean your parents just saw me as a regular horse. Even though I was labeled anthro." she sits down on a fresh hay bail. "But at least you seem to want to talk with me, so I guess I got lucky." Feeling a little bad for this horse, you decide to sit down beside her. "Don't be so upset. You can still have fun here. My parents got you as more of a pet for me. So your not going to have to do any hard work." You say patting her back. She smiles a little and says. "ya I guess. The other guy who wanted to buy me was gonna have my pulling farm equipment." "See" you say "now do you want to do anything? Like go for a walk, or just sit here and talk?" She thinks about it for a second...
11121.title: Anthro

choices: She needs to take a big dump now!
Another anthro animal steps out of the forest.
111211.content:
"You know what, a walk sounds like a great idea." the mare said. You both get up and head out the door. "I know a great trail around out property. Just follow me." You say leading the mare to the trail.

A few minutes later you both were walking this path in the woods, making small talk. "So what was you name again?" You ask "it's Charlie. And yours is jake right?" She asked in return. "Ya it is." You say. As your walking you start to take in the feature of this horse. She is about 7 feet tall, has at least DD breasts, and as you start to fall behind her a little, you notice her big firm ass! You feel guilty to stare, but her body is so intriguing, that you can't help yourself. To take you mind off her body, you ask another question. "So what kinda food do you eat Charlie?" She just shrugs. "They've been feeding me the regular horse stuff for years. So things like oats, hey, carrots. It gets kinda bland after a while." You say to her. "Don't worry. Maybe I can sneak off some house food for ya." Charlie give a little smile. "Thanks jake, that's very kind of you."

You both continue walking for a bit, until you notice her tail raise wile your walking. Your wondering what's happening, with her anus now exposed. Then suddenly *PPPPPFFFFfffffffffeeeeeerrrrrrtttttt* you were engulfed in a cloud of gas. You coughed a few times, and Charlie says. "Watch out, if your gonna walk behind me, beware of my gas" your cough a few more times. "*cough* now you tell me *cough*" Charlie just giggles at your situation. That's until.
111211.title: "Let's go for a walk."

choices: You mention shes got no toilet paper (rim job)
1112111.content:
You hear a loud rumble, and you see Charlie grab her gut. "You ok?" You ask in concern. "Ya, im Fine." She said as she lets out another huge fart. *PPPPPPFFFFFFFFFFFFFffffeeeeeeeerrrrrrrrtttttft* "though i need take a shit, like now." Thankfully this time you avoided most of her gas, only getting a light smell. "Why dont you just go?" You ask her. "Because, i havent poop outside in years. At the old farm, they had spcial toilets for us anthros. Kinda like big human toilets." You feel bad for her now, considering your parents never accounted for a anthro toilet. "Im sorry. But we dont have any toilets for anthros here, we built the stable in mind for a regular horse." Chester just lets out a big sigh. "I guess ill have to go out here."

You and Chester step off to the side of the path, and crouch behind a bush. "You know, you should give a lady a little privacy when shes doing her business." She says with a angry tone as your crouched two feet in front of her. To your defense you say. "Well ive seen regular horses poop before. I dont see how this is any difrent." She seems kinda angry with your logic. "Well for 1. I have a human level of intelligence, and 2. I walk on two... *PPPPPfffeerrrrtt* oh fuck it. If you want to stay, just dont complane about the smell." She then lets out a sigh of relief as she loosened her anus, and let the massive log inside her intestines slip out. You look down and see the head of the turd slowly making its way to the ground below. At first you just thought of Chester pooping would be like any other horse, but you were wrong. Now that you think of it, she is much closer to a human than a horse, and youve never seen another human poop before! You watch as the first log breaks off under its own weight and hits the grass with a loud thud. Your eyes then focus on the next section of the log thats making its way out. Yor so fixated on watching Chester poop, you hardly notice her talking to you. "Wait, was that?" You say shaking your mind. "I said, do you like watching me poop?" She said pointing to a third log making its way out. You blush and try to avoid looking at her face. "Im sorry. I.. i didnt think i would find it interesting. But... now that i look, its bring up all these wird feeling. Like... Like its so forbidden to see another person poop. I though it would be no big deal like seeing a dog, or a cow, or even another horse poop, but you were right, this is way difrent!" Chester just smiles and laughs. "Hahahaha omg, you thought it would be no big deal watching me poop, and now you have a fetish for watching people take a dump! I bet next time youll listen when i say somthing." Your just left blushing, and silent as you cover your face with your hands, but still watching through the gaps of your fingers as you see Chester build a pile under her ass that looks like it was made by a non anthro horse.

Eventually the last nugget falls on the pile below. Chester grabs your hands and pulls them away from your face, and she tilts your head up to talk to you face to face. "Jake. Im sorry for being a bitch when i had to go earlier. Thats becaus i had to go, and ive never had to go in front of anyone befor, and you can under stand why to respect a woman's privacy right?" She asked in a stern tone. You nodded to what she said. "Good. So from now on, if i ask you not to look, or go away, youll respect that. As for your new intrests in woman going to the bathroom. I will show you some respect, and i wont tell your parents." Its a little hard for you to get a word out, but eventually manage to say. "So... so your not mad that i like watching you poop?" She just smiles "of course not, but if im going to cater to your needs, im going to need a few favors in exchange. Now, what should we do now?" She askes.
1112111.title: She needs to take a big dump now!

11321.content:
Finally, it's that time of year again.

You grab your rifle and head off from the camp site alone. This year all of your friends were too busy to come, but that's not going to stop you from having a nice trip.

You follow countless Trails looking for any sign of a deer, and you can't seem to find any, scat, or any other indication of a deer in the area. Though it's a nice day maybe it's time to give up, and head back to the camp. Oh well there's always tomorrow

As your walking back, you can't believe your luck! You see a pair of antlers sticking out from a bush! You shoulder your rifle, and calm your self down. It's now a waiting game for the buck to expose its self, but that would be short lived, as something strikes you on the back of the head.

Your laying face down on the ground and you feel your rifle taken from your hands. "Hey sis! I got him! You can put down those shed antlers." You hear the attacker yell above you. You look up and are shocked by what you see! You see a human like deer run out from behind the bush. This can't be real, can it? The other doe runs over and puts her knee in your back as you scream out in pain "Ahhhhh what the fuck is this!?!?" The other doe holding your rifle lifts up your face and looks you in the eye. "This is revenge! I've seen lots of people like you kill our kind. It's now pay back time." She says with a evil grin, suddenly the other doe flips you over and cuts off your clothes after a bit of struggling, but eventually your left naked and defenseless on the forest floor. The first doe says to you "I'm Kayla, and this is my sister Lora, and were gonna make sure you never want to hunt again."

They start moving close to you as you back to a tree stump in fear. What do they do first?
11321.title: Anthro

choices: Kayla feels a pressure in her gut (scat/farting)
You feel like your gonna cum

She says plunking her ass on your face. "And I suggest you give a good rim job. It's been a while since I've had a good ass licking." You start licking, and are met by the taste of deer shit, and you try to keep yourself from puking.

For his sakes, he better make it nice and clean." You moan in pleasure from the hand job your getting, and you think 'maybe if I do a good job, they will let me go, or at least let there guard down' so you pick up the pace and toung the does ass to the best of your ability. "Oh feels like this guys smartening up." Kayla said to her sister. Lora smiles and says. "You just gotta give them a little incentive to do well." She then licks your head and continuous the hand job.

114221.content:
You're sitting at home on a nice Friday night, just watching the hockey game on TV. Beer in one hand, and a plate of nachos In front of you, And of course your local team is loosing! "Oh come on! He wasn't even off side! That ref is stupid." You shout at the TV. "Man, I need something to take my mind off this dumb game. If only the author would add something interesting." Suddenly you hear a sound of a trash can tipping over. 'Fucking raccoons agian' you think to your self. You get up, and grab your .22 rifle and set out to deal with the trash thieves.

As you get outside, your met with a light night rain. you see the trash can tipped over, but the garbage bag is still intact. 'This is very strange' you think. Then out of the corner of your eye you notice the shed door was open slightly. Walking over you can hear crying inside. "What the hell?" You say to your self. Then you open up the door and flick on the lights, and say "what the hell are you doping in here!" Suddenly a black and white lump in the corner sits up, still crying "I'm.. Im sorry mister, my last owner kicked me out, and, and I had no place to go, and I needed shelter." The dog says trying to hold back some tears. You lower your rifle, and you feel pretty bad for this border collie. "Hey don't cry, it's ok" you say trying to comfort her. "Do you want to come inside? It's warm, and there's food." She takes a deep breath to calm herself. "Are... Are you sure?" She says. You reach out a hand to lift her up. "Yes I'm sure. It would be cruel not to." She takes your hand, and you lead her inside

Once inside, you grab a towel and dry her off. Starting at her head, and going down to the feet. "There we go. All dry!" You say as you throw the towel aside. "Now let's go the living room, you can help yourself to all the nachos on the plate" you say leading her to the living room. As soon as you enter. The border collie drops to he knees, and starts eating all the nachos on the coffee table. With tears in her she looks at you and says. "I'm sorry, I'm just so hungry. And these taste so good!" You laugh a little and say. "Don't worry, just eat till you feel better. I'll go and fix anther plate."

You come back in to see the dog licking the plate clean. "I take it you like my microwave skills eh" she stops licking "ya it's the best food I've had in days!" You place the next plate in front of her, and watch her chow down. "So what's you name?" You ask the dog. She swallows her moth full. "I'm Jessica, and you are?" "I'm Hayden" you say. "So why did your last owner kick you out?" Jessica stops eating and looks down. "I can be very gassy at times, and he did not like it. A few days ago he got a but plug to keep my gas in, and he told me not to remove it. It was in for about 3 days, until I couldn't hold it anymore, and my poop forced the plug out, it landed on the carpet with the rest of my load. He got very mad and chased me out of the house, screaming to never come back." You feel bad for what this dog had to go threw. "Don't worry. I'll never make you do something like that. Your old owner was a bad person." Jessica stand up, and gives you a hug. "Think you. Your the kindest person I know." After she lets you go from the hug, what happens?
114221.title: Anthro

1143221.content:
To start this story line, were going to give a little back story. When you were born. Your mother passed away due to complications, and your father not mentally, or financially prepared to raise you alone, made the difficult decision to give you up for adoption. Your mothers death was hard on your father, but he eventually found peace with it, and remarried to a wonderful woman. As for you, you were ready for adoption in 3 months.

Now normally for an adoption, they select anthro babies for anthro parents, and human babies for human parents, but its not a set rule, and when your new mother saw you. The connection was instant, and strong! Even though she was a husky, and you were a human, but that didnt matter much to her.

Skip forward 16 years, and its the first say of summer break.

"Hey mom, im home!" You shout out as you throw your back pack into the closet. You walk into kitchen and see your mother. Jannet taking off her apron. "Hey kade! How was your last day of school?" She said taking a seat at the kitchen table. You smile and say. "It was awesome! Very easy things to do, just playing kahoot, watching movies, and at the end of the day, a kid pulled the fire alarm just minutes befor the final bell!" Your mother looks a little surprised "what! He really pulled it!?" "Haha ya he did, when the school bus left, we saw the police walking with him to the principles office." You say also sitting down. "Oof, just remeber not to do that. I dont want to sit threw a boring lecture by your principal, or a cop." She says it a semi joking, yet serous way. "Dont worry mom. Im not that dumb. Say what type of cookies are you makeing? They smell great!" Jannet just smiles "just good old chocolate chip. They will be ready in about 10 minutes." "Sounds great mom, and by the way you said we were going do somthing fun tonight to celebrate the first day of summer break, what were you thinking?" You ask interested in whats going to happen. Your mother leans forward and says. "Well. I was thinking of..."

To be honest, you didnt think this is how the day would unfold, but your kinda glad it did turn out this way. You never would have though about wearing a diaper befor, but after wearing this one. You put down your toy car, and grab your bottle, and a cookie from the coffee table. "Thanks mom!" You say stuffing your face with a cookie. "Looks like some one enjoys my cooking." 115111.content:
You were camping in the woods since it's the beginning of Summer break for you. You've already set up your site, built your tent, got the things needed to make a fire, and everything else is good to go.

You sprayed some Bug Spray on yourself to advoid mosquito bites and anything that might try to feast on ya.

It was around 5 in the evening, so you decided to have a stroll, keeping a flashlight on you in case it gets too dark. You admire the sky of stars to light up the sky.

You stop however as a strange odor struck your nose, followed by the sound of leaves. You hold your flashlight firmly,

"Who's there?"

You say aloud, as a silowet of a character came into view, it was too dark to tell what it was.

"Um... h-hello.."

The figure said shyly, by the sound of it, it was a male and he was DEFINITELY the source of the smell.

"Can I help you?" You ask

"May I ask the same thing?" He responded,

"I'm camping in these woods for the week to clear my mind for a bit", You stopped for a moment "Can you come out from there please?"

"Yeah", it responded as it came out from the shrubs.

You stopped for a moment, he was a SKUNK! but he can talk and walk like a human, but has no clothes on at all, leaveing his shealth and balls exposed, are you dreaming?

"You're a walking, talking anthropomorphic skunk?"

"Yeah, I don't get visitors often around, I didn't think they care about camping",

You try to lighten the mood

"Well I do, most people don't have the guts to do so".

The skunk agreed with you on the statement,

"What's your name?"

"My name is (Y/N), what's yours?"

"John"

You shake hands... paws... whatever the case is here with John.

"I must head back to my camp now, I'll see you later"

"Alright then, I'll see you around (Y/N)"

You began to run back to your site, lucky for you, you've made a fire ahead of time to help you find your way back from the dark. The smell of John still haunts your nostrils and the site of his naked body makes you slightly uncomfortable. You shake off the thought though as you put out the fire and went to bed.

The next morning, you woke up refreshed and better than ever, this was the best idea you've had all your life, but then you smelled that some odor from last night, could it be? Surely not... You covered nose and peaked out of your tent and surprise surprise, you see John eating the leftover food bits on an old bag of peanuts.

"John? Is that you?"

"Oh hey (Y/N), I was just eating some breakfast, how'd ya sleep?"

"Good, but how did you find me?"

"I kinda followed you back last night, I kinda get lonely at night."

"Well, you can stay with me if you want, but ask next time ok? I don't want to find out that all my food went missing and have to leave early"

"Right sorry"

You didn't really like the smell of John however, was it a good idea to let him stay? He might be of some use, plus you may get used of his scent eventually. You come out of your tent and cleaned up the mess you've made. While you were cleaning up, you can't help but notice that John skunk penis was half erect, what made him horny? You looked away quickly as to not let John see you staring at his cock. After about 20 minutes, you both sat down to talk about things, what should you both talk about?
115111.title: Anthro

choices: He's a bit confused, but he tries to get out of your tent.
He's indifferent to your concern, if not a little amused.
He's furious. How dare you tell him where he's allowed to poop?!
1151111.content:
When you had finished tidying up your campsite and taking a quick inventory, you found John sitting on a length of log you placed near the fire pit. Yesterday you'd rolled it from it's resting spot on the side of the gravel road, probably left there by a park ranger who needed to clear a fallen tree after a storm, and you were hoping that you could take an afternoon and chop all the firewood you could need for the week. Of course, now you had an unexpected guest, and you didn't anticipate needing a second camping chair so for now the timber would have to remain intact. Plus, you thought, considering how bad John smelled from only feet away, anything he sat on for longer than thirty seconds was probably too saturated with his smell to be safely burned.

You sat next to John on the rough bark, trying your best to breathe through your mouth. He had moved on to eating directly from your trash can, and while the scraps of roasted vegetables and mushrooms from last night were by no means rotten the thought of him eating from your garbage was still a bit uncomfortable. You clear your throat.

"So, John. Where do you live, around here?"

"I live here." He kept eating.

"Right, but, where do you live? Like, where do you sleep, usually?"

He shrugs. "Trees, usually. There's a cave nearby that's good if it's raining too hard, but when the weather's nice like this I can sleep anywhere. When it gets cold I den up somewhere, but I won't have to worry about that for a while."

"That sounds rough."

He shrugs again and finishes off the last of the trash bag with a handful of coffee grounds. "It's not bad. Besides, this is my home, you know? All this land is just for me." He looks over at you and continues. "And guests, of course."

You're taken back a little bit by that last comment. You'd felt like you were doing him a favor by letting him stay, but it seems he has the exact opposite opinion; you're on his land, and he's tolerating your presence.

Almost as if to demonstrate how comfortable he is in your campsite, John raises his tail a bit and blows a long fart against the timber. You struggle not to hold your nose, not eager to offend the mephit, but John barely seems to register your presence. He is a skunk, after all, and you doubt he has very much of a reason to be modest when strutting around his own patch of the forest. You do note, however, that his penis seemed to twitch and swell just a little bit more as he farted. You really hope that was just a coincidence.

John stands up, stretches, and starts picking around your campsite, examining your setup. As he stands you take a morbidly curious peek at the patch of log where he was sitting, and you can almost see a somewhat darker patch of bark right underneath where he was seated.
The skunk examines your camping equipment. You came well prepared, covering every emergency situation you could think of so you wouldn't have to cut your vacation short, and so he has plenty to sift through. He has questions about some of your less common pieces of kit (although he thankfully overlooks your food storage) and the two of you share some pleasant chatter while he absolutely rips ass all through your campsite. Despite the morning breeze blowing through the pines, his stench seems to cling the ground like a dense fog, not able to obscure your vision, but certainly enough to keep your from smelling anything but his funk. After briefly trying to balance on your gear-laden mountain bike (and, to your chagrin, leaving a dark brown smear on the seat) he finally gets to your tent. Without even thinking to ask your permission, he fumbles with the zipper and starts to force the tent flap open. You panic.

"Um, that's my tent!" you half-shout, balancing your need to stay on this skunk's good graces with your desire to not be huffing his residual fumes for the next five nights. He pauses, and turns back at you inquisitively. Your mind races to think of a lie. "I just... uh... be careful not to break the zipper?"

He nods, and (carefully) squirms his way into the tent. Your heart drops, and you follow him inside.

After struggling with the newly-jammed zipper for thirty seconds, you sigh and crawl in through the same small flap John entered through. The nylon has enough stretch to allow you to make it in, even with the newly-jammed zipper keeping the entrance tight, but you didn't have much room to maneuver. You squirm and crawl, and pull your legs in behind you, before triumphantly rolling over, lifting up… and very nearly bumping nose-first into John's inky black tail hole.

In a panic you freeze, and breathe in sharply - a costly mistake. You're not sure he even farted, but the raw power of John's stench sears itself into your brain. You throw yourself backwards, clasp your hands over your mouth and try very, very hard not to gag. Startling a skunk is already a bad idea, but if you make a scene behind a skunk of this size, the smell might never come out.

In a few seconds your senses return, and the skunky, funky air of your tent smells downright floral compared to the concentrated shot of skunk butt you just inhaled. You look back over at John, and see his rear still sticking out of the mouth of your sleeping bag, which he seems to have decided to investigate head-first. After a few more seconds of squirming his tail and legs disappear inside, and his head pops out in their place.

"This is nice!" he exclaims, wiggling around in your sleeping bag. "It's really warm. Is this for sleeping?”

You smile politely, and nod. You're not thrilled to have secondhand skunk polluting the one thing keeping you reasonably warm at night, but after the experience you just had, the lingering odor will surely be small peanuts in comparison. He wiggles a bit more, enjoying the texture, and you hear a muffled poot as he settles in.

You two share the silence of the tent for a few minutes, John resting, half-awake in your sleeping bag and you cross-legged on the tent floor, and you reflect on your trip so far. This chance encounter with John was proving to be a bit more consequential then you thought, but so far you’d managed not to offend him or give him cause for retribution, and he’s given you someone to talk to, despite his rear-end butting into the conversation more than you’d like. The two of you strike a conversation back up, trading some inconsequential chatter about human life versus life in the woods.
Your new conversation is unfortunately short lived, however. In the middle of talking John cuts himself off with a wince and a soft groan, and she shifts uncomfortably on his belly.

“Is something wrong?” you ask, assuming a tree root or something was poking him in a bad spot.

“Not really. Just a tummyache. Human food doesn’t always agree with me,” he responds with a slight pain in his breath.

That’s what you get for eating out of my trash!, you think, but you make the wise choice to express some concern. “Oh, no. I’m sorry that you’re not feeling well. Do you need to step outside?”

The skunk shakes his head. “No, I’ll be fine. Just gotta let it all out.”

You’re not entirely sure you understand until you see his eyes close and his tail flag upwards, tenting your sleeping bag behind his rear. Even though the fabric you hear a loud, wet-sounding fart erupt from his backside as he prepares to… oh, no!

Time slows down as your mind conjures an image of John flooding your sleeping back with skunk muck, and your mind goes into overdrive. The farting you could live with, but there was NO way you could salvage the trip if he craps himself inside your sleeping bag!

“JOHN!” you shout, surprising both the skunk and yourself with your volume. “Come on, not in my tent! Get out!”
1151111.title: Palling around with a stinker

11511113.content:
It was one thing to allowing him to stick around, he was even good company to you for a bit, but eating straight from your trash? Going into things without permission? No! and now he's gonna take a dump in your tent, you can't stand it anymore. This was your last straw and him taking a dump in YOUR tent finally made you snap. You were reasonable right? Surely John would understand and leave the tent to take his business else. You were wrong unfortunately, as you looked at a now very angry skunk.

His voice became deeper a tad, this made you worried for a moment. An angry skunk is not a good situation to be in, so you tried to calm him down.

"S-sorry, it's just t-that I don't w-want you to-"

John cuts you off
"To what? Take a dump? Listen here (Y/N), I'll have you know that this is MY forest, therefore I'M allowed to do whatever I want, whenever I desire. Your not the boss of me here, so unless you want some trouble, I suggest you shut the fuck up! GOT IT?"

"B-but here's the t-thing here, this tent is from m-my best friend's cousin and I don't want you to ruined it, otherwise I would have to pay the c-consequence."

115121.title: Anthro Skunks

choices: Just then, someone comes bursting in to your throne room!
Maybe wandering through the castle ground will help you remember?
A stench fills the room... but it's not yours!
1151211.content:
You are the skunk queen, the undisputed ruler of these woods, the lands surrounding, and all who inhabit them.

From your smelly throne in Castle Stinkdyr (a towering fortress carved by claw from an oak of incredible size), you have dominion over every plant and every creature, from the tiniest shrew to the great grizzly bear. Your black paw stretches far across the land, and your very word is law.

Quite impressive for an animal that’s only 65 centimeters tall!

Your control over the lands is rooted in both your diplomatic power and militaristic might. For the creatures (like yourself) that can appreciate the stinky things in life, you can earn their allegiance by providing pleasure truly beyond compare. Stinkdyr’s many bathrooms and toilets are the subject of legends, and all uniquely designed. And, thanks to your chefs’ extensive training with natural laxative foods, your royal dinners have never left a guest dissatisfied… or remotely clean, for that matter.

For those who are revolted by filth, you can force their submission with your gassy shock troops, rain droppings from above with your dive-bombing avian air corps, or even make a personal visit to break a particularly stubborn subject’s resistance. After all, although your family has been sitting on this throne for generations, there has never been a shortage of unsavory characters who would want nothing more than to take it from you, and you stand ready to strike back with tooth, claw, and sheer force of stink.

Of course, most of a monarch’s duties are the mundane. Your daily work typically revolves around infrastructure, distributing food, ensuring your subjects have shelter and health care… the things that keep your people healthy, fed, and happy. As fun as it is to make a surprise visit to a stubborn mayor’s opulent manor and forcefully negotiate with him to lower his town’s unreasonably high taxes, all the while filling the air with your thick gas and threatening to defecate all over his bed if he refuses to budge… the choices you make when you decide where to build roads and how to distribute medicine are the ones that really help your realm thrive.



Right now, you’re sitting on your reeking throne, surveying your throne room. Although you can’t quite tell why, you have a strong feeling that today is an important day. You rack your brain, trying to think of what you could be forgetting… did you approve the new dam the beavers are proposing? Are you supposed to be giving your military some special training later? Do you have an important guest arriving soon? Do you just need to visit one of the bathrooms to clear your head? Your striped tail flicks back and forth behind you as you ponder.
1151211.title: The skunk queen.

11531.content:
You had just gotten off the airplane to Africa for one reason, and that is to fulfill your fetish, to experience the gross sides of animals. You had a lot of reasons for choosing Africa but the main reason was that there were a lot of big yet friendly animals, such as giraffes and Elephants. Of course, there were also lions and Hyena's but you preferred to not think about what an encounter with them would be like.

Upon leaving the airport with your bags you rented out a room in a nearby motel. While sure, you wanted to experience some quality animal stink you didn't want that to be your entire life. After situating yourself with the area and gathering information on where large herds of elephant stay you made your move. The next morning would be your greatest experience ever.


THE NEXT MORNING

As soon as you woke up you put on clothes to keep you cool yet cover up the skin, to prevent yourself from getting that dirty. You also made sure to get a face mask to prevent getting shit in your mouth and nose because that would probably lead to some health issues and awkward questions from the doctor.

You made your way over to a desert oasis that Elephants gather around frequently in the day. As you approached you saw no sign of life other than the oasis itself. You looked for a rock a little back from the water and sat beside it facing the lake because an elephant would stand right in front of you with it's back to your face while obliviously drinking water. You decided to relax for a big, and while doing that you drifted into sleep. When you awoke...


A: There was a pink ring right in front of your face and a furry tail on top of your head.
B: There was a couple of elephants drinking from the oasis, but none near you.
C: The Oasis was still Baren, you had probably missed them.
11531.title: Elephant.

info.brief_description: It seems the original is gone sadly, but that's no reason we can't continue the fun!
info.description:
Any creature you can think of is in this story showing their gross side. Whether from a movie, video game, tv show, or even real life, these animals will be as gross as possible. Every kind of stink is here. Enjoy!

I guess the rules will be pretty simple, anything to to with animal stink is allowed.

What I can still find of the original story
https://web.archive.org/web/20181013025552/https://www.writing.com/main/interact...
